coredata.dc:title: The minor crossing number of graphs with an excluded minor

abstract.ce:para: The minor crossing number of a graph G is the minimum crossing number of a graph that contains G as a minor. It is proved that for every graph H there is a constant c, such that every graph G with no H-minor has minor crossing number at most c|V(G)|.

item-info.copyright: Copyright 2008 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

citation-title.titletext: The minor crossing number of graphs with an excluded minor

affiliation.organization: Faculty of Computer and Information Science

abstract.ce:para: The minor crossing number of a graph G is the minimum crossing number of a graph that contains G as a minor. It is proved that for every graph H there is a constant c, such that every graph G with no H-minor has minor crossing number at most c|V(G)|.
